violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer name 'Сергей' collected at 8.436s. Operator responded 'Слушаю вас' at 12.816s but never repeated name back or requested confirmation ('Сергей, верно?'). Phone number was properly echoed at 11:56.515 with confirmation.

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Search for available tire mounting dates. Operator announced 'Сейчас посмотрю информацию. Минуту, пожалуйста' at 5:41.635. Delivered information 'Ближайшая свободная запись на 24 октября' at 6:53.311. Total duration: 71.7 seconds (>45s threshold). Operator checked in at 6:26.446 ('Спасибо') and 6:35.326 ('за ждающую минуту'), but total search time still exceeds limit.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for customer name
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer provides their name, repeat it back and ask for confirmation: 'Сергей, верно?' This was done correctly for phone number (912-615-69-64, верно?) but missed for the customer name.

When searching for available dates, work to complete search within 40 seconds. If search requires more time, consider taking customer callback information to research thoroughly. The 71.7-second search, while including customer check-ins, exceeded acceptable duration.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting 'Здравствуйте, компания 74-х колесами, зовут Алина. Как к вам можно обращаться?' includes company name, operator name, and request for customer name. Proper closing 'спасибо за звонок. Всего доброго, до свидания.' Customer orientation question asked 'Чем-то ещё могу вам помочь?'

7.2.evidence: Name 'Сергей' not echoed back with confirmation. Phone number was properly echoed.
7.2.note: Partial compliance - phone handled correctly, name was not

7.3.evidence: Intro at 3.316s (<5s). Disconnect at ~2.7s after last speech (<5s)

6.1.evidence: No critical silence >45s leading to customer hangup. Call completed successfully.

9.1.note: Operator did check in with customer during search, but total duration still exceeded threshold

9.3.evidence: Operator thanked customer after searches: 'Спасибо за ожидание' (multiple instances at 6:26, 11:18, 17:33)

3.1.evidence: All customer requests addressed: tire purchase completed, trade-in and tire size compatibility questions escalated to manager with callback scheduled, tire mounting location resolved with partner addresses provided
3.1.note: Proper escalation to manager for technical questions demonstrates good service

3.3.evidence: Only partner public phone number disclosed (904-174-4111). No confidential internal information shared.

3.6.evidence: Operator consistently searched system before providing information: 'Сейчас посмотрю', 'Сейчас проверю информацию'

5.1.evidence: Complete information provided: tire models, prices (9670₽, 10590₽), addresses (Шевская 3М, Серафима Дерябина 30А, Волгоградская 208), partner phone, order number (96-97-64)

10.2.evidence: Logical information presentation, proper script adherence throughout call

10.3.evidence: Professional dialogue management, maintained conversation control, proper opening and closing, addressed all customer questions systematically
10.3.note: Customer name collected but not used consistently throughout call - minor opportunity for improvement

10.6.evidence: Complete and accurate product information, pricing, promotional offers (extended warranty, free tire mounting, trade-in, 5% discount, 15L fuel), locations, scheduling

2.1.evidence: No service refusal or call dropout. Call completed successfully with order placement.

1.1.evidence: No rudeness, profanity, or harsh language detected. Professional tone maintained throughout.

4.1.evidence: Customer asked many questions and required clarification multiple times. Operator handled patiently and professionally without showing frustration.
4.1.note: Good handling of inquisitive customer with complex requirements

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company and operator name clearly stated
Proper closing with thanks and polite farewell
Excellent phone number echo confirmation (912-615-69-64, верно?)
Consistent system verification before providing information
Multiple customer check-ins during long search showing attentiveness
Thanked customer for waiting after each search ('Спасибо за ожидание')
Patient handling of customer's multiple questions and concerns
Complete product information with all promotional details provided
Proper escalation to manager for technical questions beyond call center scope
Successfully completed complex order with trade-in inquiry and callback scheduling
Confirmation of order number and SMS notification

data_quality.confidence_notes: Clear transcription with accurate timestamps. Word-level JSON available for precise echo method detection.
